footer.questionsMessage: If you have any question about our products, fulfillment or what is the best time to go surfing in Munich, drop us a message. We are happy to help!
footer.getInTouch: You can also get in touch with us via Facebook or Instagram.
footer.subscribeText: Join to get hear about our latest products and deals!
footer.conditions: Free shipping for orders over 15 Euro within Germany 1 month unconditional exchange or refund

banner.shipping: Free Shipping on Orders Over 15â‚¬ (within Germany)!

feature.text: The Eisbach Riders Single Tab Future fiberglass in with a honeycomb core is extra lightweight and provides an immediate response during your turns. With a moderate flex it is ideal for making fast changes of direction. The fin design is suited for any waves as well as for river surfing.

newProduct.text_wax: We are so excited to be able to bring you this premium, eco-friendly surf wax! Ride waves with confidence and a clear conscience! Bee Swell Eco-Friendly surf wax is made with 100% pure beeswax that has been ethically sourced by natural beekeepers. Proceeds help to provide pollinator habitat and resources for honeybee rescues.
newProduct.text_hangers: The patented SHEPPS GNARWALL surfboard hook and hanger system is the only completely hidden surfboard rack on the market. The eco-conscious surf rack is made in Canada by SHEPPS and fits FCS I/II, Future and single fin boards. Secure the hanger to a wall, attach the hook to your board, and you're ready to hang!

about.mission: Eisbach Riders is a surf brand from Munich, Germany that specializes in surf equipment and accessories. We are passionate surfers with a mission to protect our playgrounds - the ocean and rivers that provide us so much enjoyment - by supporting local communities and efforts to preserve our water sources. Our focus is to provide sustainably packaged and affordable products so you can feel good about jumping back into the water.
about.community: We are members of and support our local outdoor clubs in protecting our water playgrounds and we want to encourage other communities to come together to protect theirs! Check out below for how you can get involved in Munich or globally by joining a club, donating, teaching kids to surf, or picking up trash!
about.sustainability: All of our products are packed in sustainable and environmentally friendly packaging and we are trying to take all measures that we can to reduce the amount of waste and plastic that goes into the development and shipping of our products. We donate 1% of our revenue to charities that help protect our oceans, rivers and lakes. COMING SOON: We will offer a new Green Line of fins that will focus on donating the majority of the profits to protecting the ocean!
about.us1: We are Robin and Michael. We met during our studies at Technical University of Munich and have been friends ever since. We are not professional surfers and if we are being honest, we will likely never be haha, but we love being out on the waves! And we want everyone to be able to enjoy their local water sources without breaking the bank or having to feel guilty for buying something double wrapped in plastic.
about.us2: When we decided to follow our passion and start this brand we wanted to focus on sustainable packaging and supporting local communities. Eisbach Riders was founded in September 2018 in Munich and while we are still a young start up, we are overflowing with ideas on how to making purchasing surf gear more sustainable.

newsletter.message: Sign up for our monthly newsletter to be the first to hear about the latest products and on-goings at Eisbach Riders.
newsletter.legal1: You can unsubscribe at any time by clicking the link in the footer of our emails. We use Mailchimp as our marketing platform. By clicking below to subscribe, you acknowledge that your information will be transferred to Mailchimp for processing.
